title: How to unsubscribe from Paramount+
description: Canceling your Paramount+ subscription depends on how you initially subscribed. This guide provides instructions for various platforms, including the Paramount+ website, iPhone/iPad (App Store), Android (Google Play), and third-party services like Roku and Amazon Prime Video.

web.title: Cancel Paramount+ Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Paramount+ subscription via the website:

*   Go to paramountplus.com and sign in to your account.
*   Click on your profile icon.
*   Select "Account".
*   Find the "Cancel Subscription" option under the "Subscription & Billing" section.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm your cancellation.

app.title: Cancel Paramount+ Subscription via iOS App
app.description:
To cancel your Paramount+ subscription via iPhone or iPad:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your Apple ID name, then choose "Subscriptions".
*   Find and tap Paramount+, then tap "Cancel Subscription" and confirm.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Paramount+ subscription. Follow these simple steps to unsubscribe from Paramount+ on various platforms, including the website, iOS, Android, Roku, and Amazon Prime Video. Ensure you cancel through the same platform where you initially subscribed to avoid unwanted charges. You will retain access until the end of your current billing cycle.
